item.title: About
item.description:
Yang Ching Jen

I’m Yang Ching Jen, working at a foreign company. With over 10 years of experience in software development, I am a passionate, adventurous, and skilled professional dedicated to the fields of software engineering and system architecture.

Experience

  • 2025.02 – 2025.12   Software Engineer, YAICHING CO., LTD.
  • 2024.09 – 2024.12   Manager, CTBC Bank Co., Ltd.
  • 2021.04 – 2024.07   Application Architect, International Business Machines CO., LTD.
  • 2020.04 – 2021.04   Software Engineer, Frog-Jump Information CO., LTD.
  • 2019.01 - 2020.03   Software Engineer, Wistron Information Technology & Services Corp.
  • 2017.08 - 2018.12   Section Manager, Tien Pou International LTD., Taiwan Br. (CAYMAN)
  • 2016.09 - 2017.06   Associate Engineer, Institute for Information Industry
  • 2016.03 - 2016.05   Software Engineer, POU CHEN INDUSTRIAL CO., LTD
  • 2015.02 - 2016.02   Research and Development Engineer, San Da CATV CO., LTD.

Certificate

  • Sun Certified Professional, Sun Certified Java Programmer, SE6 (SCJP)
  • Sun Certified Professional, Sun Certified Web Component Developer, EE5 (SCWCD)

Skills

  • Programming: Java (Frameworks: Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA, Hibernate, ZL Framework, Struts 2), Servlet/JSP, Shell Script, PHP, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, .Net Core(C#)
  • Database: MySQL, SQL Server, Oracle (PL/SQL)
  • Virtualization: VMWare, Docker
  • Management Platform: K8S, OCP
  • CI/CD: Jenkins, Azure DevOps

Luo Bo Gao

She is my lovely puppy, my little daughter at heart, a Gemini girl who is both adorable and a little timid.
